questions.question_text:
A user is notified their software install has been flagged for reclamation. The user declines approval.
What is the next step in the workflow?

choices.D: The software is reclaimed since it was not in use.
choices.C: The reclamation candidate is removed from the candidate list.
choices.B: The userâ€™s manager must approve or decline the reclamation.

questions.question_text: Which of the following features enables organizations to easily upgrade a standard version of their software to an enterprise version?

discussion.content: I think "Software Assurance" .. "if you are covered under Microsoft SA you can also upgrade or step up, a standard version of your software to an enterprise edition"
I believe its C , Software Assurance.

questions.question_text: What role must be granted in order to create new reports that could be viewed by other people?

discussion.content: D => I have tested and the "ITIL" role only has the options to "export to PDF" & "Add to Dashboard". The "Global Report User [report_global]" has one more option is "Share"
C - ITIL is correct answer, ther report_global can manage the reports shared with "everyone"

C - the word "create new" is the difference here. 

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-now-intelligence/page/use/reporting/concept/c_AdminsteringReports.html

Selected Answer: D
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-now-intelligence/page/use/reporting/reference/reporting-roles.html

global report user [report_global] Can manage reports that are shared with everyone (listed in Global).

questions.question_text: Software Asset Management (SAM) Professional reports can be delivered in which formats? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCD
B,C,D is the right answer

Selected Answer: BCD
PDI shows export options:
Excel (xls)
CSV
JSON
PDF

B. PDF
C. CSV
D. XLS

questions.question_text: The goals of Software Asset Management include which of the following? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACE
The answer is A, C and E
Optimize Spend
Maintain compliance
Support software audits

It's on page 13 of the SAM Pro manual that comes with the course.

Selected Answer: ACE
The goals of SAM are:
Maintain compliance
Optimize spend
Support software audits
